pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Reporting with 'Quarto' // Provides statistical components, tables, and graphs that are useful in 'Quarto' and 'RMarkdown' reports and that produce 'Quarto' elements for special formatting such as tabs and marginal notes and graphs. Some of the functions produce entire report sections with tabs, e.g., the missing data report created by missChk(). Functions for inserting variables and tables inside 'graphviz' and 'mermaid' diagrams are included, and so are special clinical trial graphics for adverse event reporting.
